member.name: IDirectDrawClipper.GetClipList
member.summary: Retrieves a copy of the clip list that is associated with a DirectDrawClipper object. To select a subset of the clip list, you can pass a rectangle that clips the clip list.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that GetClipList uses to clip the clip list. Set this parameter to NULL to retrieve the entire clip list.

A pointer to a structure that receives the resulting copy of the clip list. If this parameter is NULL, GetClipList fills the variable at lpdwSize with the number of bytes necessary to hold the entire clip list.

A pointer to a variable that receives the size of the resulting clip list. When retrieving the clip list, this parameter is the size of the buffer at lpClipList. When lpClipList is NULL, the variable at lpdwSize receives the required size of the buffer, in bytes.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, the return value is DD_OK.
If it fails, the method can return one of the following error values:

member.name: IDirectDrawClipper.GetHWnd
member.summary: Retrieves the window handle that was previously associated with this DirectDrawClipper object by the method.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives the window handle that was previously associated with this DirectDrawClipper object by the method.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, the return value is DD_OK.
If it fails, the method can return one of the following error values:

member.name: IDirectDrawClipper.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes a DirectDrawClipper object that was created by using the COM function.
member.param: A pointer to the DirectDraw object to associate with the DirectDrawClipper object. If this parameter is set to NULL, an independent DirectDrawClipper object is initialized; a call of this type is equivalent to using the function.
Currently not used and must be set to 0.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, the return value is DD_OK.
If it fails, the method can return one of the following error values:

member.name: IDirectDrawClipper.IsClipListChanged
member.summary: Retrieves the status of the clip list if a window handle is associated with a DirectDrawClipper object.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives the status of the clip list. This parameter is TRUE if the clip list has changed, and FALSE otherwise.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, the return value is DD_OK.
If it fails, the method can return one of the following error values:

member.name: IDirectDrawClipper.SetClipList
member.summary: Sets or deletes the clip list that is used by the , , and methods on surfaces to which the parent DirectDrawClipper object is attached.
member.param: A pointer to a valid structure for the clip list to set or NULL. If there is an existing clip list that is associated with the DirectDrawClipper object and this value is NULL, the clip list is deleted.
Currently not used and must be set to 0.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, the return value is DD_OK.
If it fails, the method can return one of the following error values:

member.name: IDirectDrawClipper.SetHWnd
member.summary: Sets the window handle that the clipper object uses to obtain clipping information.
member.param: Currently not used and must be set to 0.
Window handle that obtains the clipping information.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, the return value is DD_OK.
If it fails, the method can return one of the following error values:
